definition: to slice/slice/thin section of a specimen (for microscopic examination)
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
slide examination/microscopic examination of thin section of specimen as part of biopsy

sentences.english: The left slice shows an area active during extemporaneous speech just posterior and adjacent to the tumor.
sentences.chinese: 左切片显示面积活跃在即席讲话只是后，毗邻的肿瘤。

sentences.english: Sophie:Now wash them, then dice the potatoes and bell peppers. Then slice the meat.
sentences.chinese: 现在把他们都洗干净，青椒和土豆切成丁儿，肉切片。

sentences.english: Slice like a pro without risking a cut.
sentences.chinese: 像专业人士那样切片也不用担心割伤。

sentences.english: In this paper analysis is made on the defects of present diamond dry cutting wheels.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了目前风冷式金刚石干切片存在的缺陷。

sentences.english: Sections of the lungs at this stage would show larvae in the bronchioles.
sentences.chinese: 这时候肺部切片可显示细支气管内有蛔蚴。

sentences.english: No deaths were attributed to any biopsy procedure.
sentences.chinese: 任何一种切片程序皆无造成死亡。

sentences.english: Slice up cucumbers and tomatoes and mix together with a cup of low-fat cottage cheese.
sentences.chinese: 切片黄瓜和西红柿，混合的和低脂松软干酪杯在一起。

sentences.english: Ore distributed shape was deduced by the apparent resistivity section.
sentences.chinese: 利用视电阻率切片图来推演矿体展布形态。

sentences.english: Allow your loaf to cool completely on a rack, about 2 hours, before slicing.
sentences.chinese: 面包置晾在钢架上2小时，完全凉透才切片。

sentences.english: Cut the remaining half chorizo and bacon into slices and lay them on top.
sentences.chinese: 余下半份香肠和烟肉切片，铺上表面。

sentences.english: When you eat it like sliced torfu, it is albumen of egg boiled in tea.
sentences.chinese: 好似切片的豆腐干，吃起来竟是茶叶蛋的蛋白。

sentences.english: The new specimen retraction function, improve slice quality.
sentences.chinese: 全新的样品回缩功能，提高切片质量。

sentences.english: Results To describe the shape of hippocampal formation from sections.
sentences.chinese: 结果从切片上描述海马结构的形态。

sentences.english: Pay attention how thin the slices are.
sentences.chinese: 请注意这些薄如纸张的白菜切片。

sentences.english: ObjectiveInspecting the best soaking time for cutting paeonia.
sentences.chinese: 目的优选白芍切片的最佳浸泡时间。

definition: to peel/to remove the skin/to tare
to cut up (into pieces)/to slice/to carve/to dice/to shred
chunks obtained by repeatedly cutting a vegetable diagonally and rotating the vegetable after each cut
(of a male) to come of age/an adult male
